ThingTemplate.description: Context manager template {PTC.SCA.SCO.ContextManagerTemplate} holding the services related to equipment context
ThingTemplate.name: PTC.SCA.SCO.ContextManagerTemplate

ServiceDefinition.description: Retrieve the context permission for a specific user or user group
ServiceDefinition.name: GetContextPermission

ResultType.description: Context permission for a specific user or user group
ResultType.name: result

FieldDefinition.description: Principal name. Either user name or user group name to retrieve permissions on contexts for
FieldDefinition.name: principal

FieldDefinition.description: User or Group
FieldDefinition.name: principalType

ServiceDefinition.description: Retrieves the context permissions for a specified user.
ServiceDefinition.name: GetContextPermissionByUser

ResultType.description: Context permission for a specific user
ResultType.name: result

FieldDefinition.description: Name of user to retrieve permissions on contexts for
FieldDefinition.name: userName

ServiceDefinition.description: Retrieves the context permissions for a specified user group.
ServiceDefinition.name: GetContextPermissionByUserGroup

ResultType.description: Context permission for a specific group
ResultType.name: result

FieldDefinition.description: Name of group to find permissions on contexts for
FieldDefinition.name: userGroupName

ServiceDefinition.description: Get the enabled configuration rows in EquipmentContextSettings on LaunchPointConfiguration for the contexts that the specified user has the specified permission.
ServiceDefinition.name: GetContextsByUserAndPermission

ResultType.description: The enabled configuration rows in EquipmentContextSettings on LaunchPointConfiguration for the contexts that the specified user has the specified permission.
ResultType.name: result

FieldDefinition.description: Context permission type, which can be Read or Write.
FieldDefinition.name: permissionType

FieldDefinition.description: User name.
FieldDefinition.name: userName

ServiceDefinition.description: Retrieves the permission for the current user on the specified equipment: None, Read, or Write.
ServiceDefinition.name: GetCurrentUserPermissionOnThing

FieldDefinition.description: The equipment (Thing name) for which we want to retrieve the current userâ€™s permission.
FieldDefinition.name: equipmentName

ServiceDefinition.description: Retrieves the entity permissions in a specified context for a specified user group.
ServiceDefinition.name: GetEntityPermissionsByUserGroupOnContext

ResultType.description: InfoTable that contains entities and the permissions (Read/Write) a group has on them.
ResultType.name: result

FieldDefinition.description: Name of the context to retrieve the entity permissions on.
FieldDefinition.name: contextName

FieldDefinition.description: Name of the user group to find permissions for.
FieldDefinition.name: userGroupName

ServiceDefinition.description: Retrieves the entity permissions in a specified context for a specified user.
ServiceDefinition.name: GetEntityPermissionsByUserOnContext

ResultType.description: InfoTable that contains entities and the permissions (Read/Write) a user has on them.
ResultType.name: result

FieldDefinition.description: Name of the context to retrieve the entity permissions on.
FieldDefinition.name: contextName

FieldDefinition.description: Name of the user to find permissions for.
FieldDefinition.name: userName

ServiceDefinition.description: Retrieve the permissions on entities that a user or user group has in the given context
ServiceDefinition.name: GetEntityPermissionsOnContext

ResultType.description: InfoTable that contains entities and the permissions (Read/Write) a user or user group has on them.
ResultType.name: result

FieldDefinition.description: Name of the context to retrieve the entity permissions on.
FieldDefinition.name: contextName

FieldDefinition.description: Principal name. Either user name or user group name to retrieve permissions on contexts for.
FieldDefinition.name: principal

FieldDefinition.description: User or Group
FieldDefinition.name: principalType

ServiceDefinition.description: Gets the equipment structure of a given context. Used mostly for filtering equipment views.
ServiceDefinition.name: GetEquipmentStructureForContext

ResultType.description: Simplified tree structure representation used mainly in tree structure filters.
ResultType.name: result

FieldDefinition.description: The name of the context for which to get the equipment structure. If no context is passed, or if the user has no permissions on the equipment within the context, this service will return an empty infotable.
FieldDefinition.name: contextName

FieldDefinition.description: Whether to include Assets
FieldDefinition.name: includeAsset

FieldDefinition.description: Max level hierarchy level.
FieldDefinition.name: maxLevel

FieldDefinition.description: permission type needed by the user on the entities
FieldDefinition.name: permissionType

ServiceDefinition.description: Retrieves the permissions of the entities in a specified context.
ServiceDefinition.name: GetPermissionsByContext

ResultType.description: Entity permission information for a given context.
ResultType.name: result

FieldDefinition.description: Context name
FieldDefinition.name: contextName

ServiceDefinition.description: Grants read/write permissions to a user or user group on entities or contexts.
ServiceDefinition.name: GrantPermissionsOnEntities

FieldDefinition.description: Entities to be granted permissions on, which can be either context or equipment.
FieldDefinition.name: entities

FieldDefinition.description: Context permission type, which can be Read, Write, or None
FieldDefinition.name: permissionType

FieldDefinition.description: Principal name. Either user name or user group name.
FieldDefinition.name: principal

FieldDefinition.description: User or Group
FieldDefinition.name: principalType

ServiceDefinition.description: Grants read/write permissions to user groups on entities or contexts.
ServiceDefinition.name: GrantUserGroupPermissionsOnEntities

FieldDefinition.description: Entities to be granted permissions on, which can be either context or equipment.
FieldDefinition.name: entities

FieldDefinition.description: Entities permission type, which can be Read, Write, or None
FieldDefinition.name: permissionType

FieldDefinition.description: User group names.
FieldDefinition.name: userGroupNames

ServiceDefinition.description: Grants read/write permissions to users on entities or contexts.
ServiceDefinition.name: GrantUserPermissionsOnEntities

FieldDefinition.description: Entities to be granted permissions on, which can be either context or equipment.
FieldDefinition.name: entities

FieldDefinition.description: Entities permission type, which can be Read, Write, or None
FieldDefinition.name: permissionType

FieldDefinition.description: User names.
FieldDefinition.name: userNames

ServiceDefinition.description: Propagates user or user group permissions to all entities below a specified entity in a specific context.
ServiceDefinition.name: PropagatePermissionsOnEntities

FieldDefinition.description: Context name.
FieldDefinition.name: contextName

FieldDefinition.description: Equipment entity name in the context starting from which the permission will be propagated down to the "leaf nodes". If entityName is empty, the permissions are propagated to the entire network from the root.
FieldDefinition.name: entityName

FieldDefinition.description: Permission type which can be Read, Write or None.
FieldDefinition.name: permissionType

FieldDefinition.description: Either user name or user group name.
FieldDefinition.name: principal

FieldDefinition.description: User or Group to specify the principal type.
FieldDefinition.name: principalType

ServiceDefinition.description: Propagates user group permissions to all entities below a specified entity in a specific context.
ServiceDefinition.name: PropagateUserGroupPermissionsOnEntities

FieldDefinition.description: Context name.
FieldDefinition.name: contextName

FieldDefinition.description: Equipment entity name in the context starting from which the permission will be propagated down to the "leaf nodes". If entityName is empty, the permissions are propagated to the entire network from the root.
FieldDefinition.name: entityName

FieldDefinition.description: Permission type which can be Read, Write or None.
FieldDefinition.name: permissionType

FieldDefinition.description: User group names InfoTable.
FieldDefinition.name: userGroupNames

ServiceDefinition.description: Propagates user permissions to all entities below a specified entity in a specific context.
ServiceDefinition.name: PropagateUserPermissionsOnEntities

FieldDefinition.description: Context name.
FieldDefinition.name: contextName

FieldDefinition.description: Equipment entity name in the context starting from which the permission will be propagated down to the "leaf nodes". If entityName is empty, the permissions are propagated to the entire network from the root.
FieldDefinition.name: entityName

FieldDefinition.description: Permission type which can be Read, Write or None.
FieldDefinition.name: permissionType

FieldDefinition.description: User names InfoTable.
FieldDefinition.name: userNames
